string.value: I better go check and see the Maple Administrator. She may have something in store for me...

The Maple Administrator needs #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red ribbon#k to make me an #rEaster Basket#k. I better go get those right now! 

#t4000003# #b#c4000003#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/100#k
#t4031192# #b#c4031192#/1#k
I got the Easter Basket from the Maple Administrator. Mad Bunny may need this for something... I should go see him now.
Easter is upon us. To celebrate, I'll be crafting Easter Baskets for everyone. Do you want one?
Good choice. Can you bring me #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k?
I see. I make the best baskets in town, so if you change your mind, I'll be here.
Great job gathering up #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k needed to make the #rEaster Basket#k. Now let me see here...
Here's your #rEaster Basket#k! By the way, I hear that the Easter Bunny's nasty cousin is trying to ruin Easter this year. Avoid that rotten egg. He is a disgrace to the season~
Are you are missing something? I need #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k to make an #rEaster Basket#k.
